/* MultiDetail.retrieveEmployeeList */ SELECT emp.num, emp.name, emp.birthdate, emp.ssn, emp.sex, emp.telephone, emp.address, emp.postal, emp.skill_code, emp.joblevel_code, emp.department_code, emp.atch_file_bunch_no, emp.atch_file_bunch_no2, job.name as job, org.name as department, skill.name as skill, elap_id FROM UIP_EMPLOYEE emp LEFT JOIN UIP_JOBLEVEL job ON (emp.joblevel_code = job.code) LEFT JOIN UIP_DEPARTMENT org ON (emp.department_code = org.code) LEFT JOIN UIP_SKILL skill ON (emp.skill_code = skill.code)
emp.joblevel_code = #joblevelCode#
emp.department_code = #departmentCode#
emp.skill_code = #skillCode#
order by 1
